title.rendered: Round #4: Wrangler NFR LIVE Las Vegas Rodeo Today 12/11/2023

content.rendered:
Giddy up, cowboys and cowgirls! The National Finals Rodeo 2023 is almost upon us, promising ten days of thrilling competition, breathtaking performances, and edge-of-your-seat excitement. Whether you’re a seasoned rodeo enthusiast or a curious newcomer, this guide will equip you with all the information you need to witness the “Super Bowl of Rodeo” live, no matter where you are in the world.

Here’s what you need to know about WRANGLER NFR Round 4:

Date: Saturday, December 11, 2023
Time: 8:45 PM ET
Location: Thomas & Mack Center, Las Vegas, Nevada
Events: Bareback Riding, Steer Wrestling, Team Roping, Saddle Bronc Riding, Tie-Down Roping, Barrel Racing, Bull Riding

Stream the Wrangler NFR Round 4 LIVE from Las Vegas: Start your free trial today!

The 2023 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) presented by Teton Ridge continues with Round 4 on Monday, December 11th, 2023. The competition heats up at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas, Nevada, with cowboys and cowgirls battling it out for the coveted NFR championship titles.

Wrangler NFR Round 3 Results, Dec. 10

Bareback Riding: Third round: 1. Mason Clements, 88.5 points on Frontier Rodeo Co.’s Breaking News, $30,706; 2. (tie) Keenan Hayes and Cole Reiner, 87.5, $21,296 each; 4. Jacob Lees, 86.5, $12,877; 5. Kade Sonnier, 85, $7,924; 6. Jess Pope, 84.5, $4,953; 7. Tanner Aus, 84; 8. Jayco Roper, 80; 9. Richmond Champion, 79; 10. Leighton Berry, 78; 11. Clayton Biglow, 75.5; 12. Orin Larsen, 74; 13. Rocker Shane Steiner, 73.5; 14. Tim O’Connell, 73; 15. Dean Thompson, NS. Average leaders: 1. (tie) Mason Clements and Cole Reiner, 254.5 points on three head; 3. Jess Pope, 254; 4. Keenan Hayes, 253.5; 5. Tanner Aus, 250; 6. Rocker Shane Steiner, 249; 7. Kade Sonnier, 248; 8. Richmond Champion, 246.5; 9. Leighton Berry, 245; 10. Clayton Biglow, 244.5; 11. Jacob Lees, 243; 12. Jayco Roper, 242.5; 13. Tim O’Connell, 236; 14. Orin Larsen, 231.5; 15. Dean Thompson, 155 points on two head. World Standings: 1. Keenan Hayes, $303,630; 2. Rocker Shane Steiner, $214,536; 3. Clayton Biglow, $198,657; 4. Kade Sonnier, $180,045; 5. Jess Pope, $178,650; 6. Leighton Berry, $176,045; 7. Cole Reiner, $173,784; 8. Tim O’Connell, $169,326; 9. Mason Clements, $166,872; 10. Orin Larsen, $157,237; 11. Jayco Roper, $144,406; 12. Dean Thompson, $141,452; 13. Jacob Lees, $140,685; 14. Tanner Aus, $140,297; 15. Richmond Champion, $138,527.

Steer Wrestling: Third round: 1. Nick Guy, 4.2 seconds, $30,706; 2. (tie) Stephen Culling and Stan Branco, 4.3, $21,296 each; 4. Bridger Anderson, 4.7, $12,877; 5. Dakota Eldridge, 4.8, $7,924; 6. (tie) Tyler Waguespack, Will Lummus and Don Payne, 4.9, $1,651 each; 9. Dalton Massey, 5.0; 10. Jesse Brown, 6.7; 11. J.D. Struxness, 14.1; 12. (tie) Ty Erickson, Dirk Tavenner, Cody Devers and Jacob Talley, NT. Average leaders: 1. Dalton Massey, 13.0 seconds on three head; 2. (tie) Tyler Waguespack and Nick Guy, 13.1 each; 4. RAM Top Gun: 1. Ky John Hamilton, $83,299; 2. (tie) Jake Long, Clint Summers and Rocker Shane Steiner, $71,413 each; 5. Stan Branco, $62,003; 6. (tie) Creek Walker Young and Lisa Lockhart, $59,031 each; 8. Cole Reiner, $55,564; 9. (tie) Cory Solomon and Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi, $53,583 each.

Don’t miss a single moment of the action! Tune in live on The Cowboy Channel or catch the livestream on cowboychannelplus.com. For those in the USA, SlingTV also offers streaming access. If you’re watching internationally, ExpressVPN lets you tune in from anywhere.
